text: Horacio Antonio Rodríguez Larreta (born in Buenos Aires, October 29, 1965) is an Argentine politician and economist. On December 10, 2015 he became Chief of Government of the City of Buenos Aires. He was reelected for a new term in 2019. Rodríguez Larreta is a Roman Catholic. He has stated his personal opposition to the legalization of abortion in Argentina. He suffers from essential tremor (ET). ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Buenos Aires Category:Argentine economists
title: Horacio Rodríguez Larreta
